column4:
R those peach ones percs?
Those were my fave, Endo pharm
Those E700s fucking burn when they go up the nose. I did them once and it was a huge mistake. No wonder opiates aren’t my thing
Think that’s the acetaminophen in them

Use to hufflesnuff bulky 5's/10's with acetaminophen and barely any burn (still sucked tho)

Could be a number of things. I mean, we never got the chance to see what gets put into those lil bastards

Why?

You only got high once the powder hit your stomach. 5/10mg of powder is very small, plus you have a fuckload of APAP and binders on top of that which block your mucus membranes from even absorbing that tiny amount of worthwhile powder.

Never understood this. It's like the people who snort bars and say they get high from it. Lol, just lol.
